item.title: My defense presentation
item.description: I defended my dissertation on October 2nd, and here are the slides from my talk

item.title: My talk @ Evolution Meeting, 2017
item.description: I just found out (almost by accident) that the filming of my talk at the Macroevolution I session during the Evolution meeting last June in Portland, OR, is online (click here or on the image to watch it on youtube). Please, feel free to leave any feedback! Any suggestion will be greatly appreciated!
